review_description: Love the full control of this service and app. Automatic backup and had it for two or three phones now so phone migration and keeping my pictures is not an issue. At $1.99 per month I like the control a small paid service gives me.

Works well auto uploading photos from phone. Love that I can store uncompressed, even raw, pics. Downgraded to 3 stars due to lack of some basic features.
